job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pstrongA Little About This GigstrongppYou would be working with a forwardthinking team merging innovation and technology In this role you willpulliStrike a balance between critical thinking and actual handson analysesliliStitch and calibrate sparse and noisy data across various data sourcesliliUndertake preprocessing of structured and unstructured dataliliAnalyze large amounts of information to discover trends and patternsliliBuild predictive models and machinelearning algorithmsliliPresent information using data visualization techniquesliliApply statistics techniques to improve our experimentation platform and processliliPropose solutions and strategies to business challengesliliCollaborate with engineering and product development teamsliliDeliver on timeline commitments where necessaryliliBuild trust and strong relationships at all levelsliulpbrppstrongThe Perfect CandidatestrongpulliThe ideal candidate will be intricately involved in running analytical experiments in a methodical manner and will regularly evaluate alternate models via theoretical approacheslili5 years of experience is REQUIREDliliPrior data science experience preferably in an engineering or technology roleliliStrong Quantitative background Masters expected PhD preferredliliFamiliarity with common analysis tools SQL and Jupyter are preferredliliProgramming chops demonstrable familiarity work experience Github account with programming concepts Python skills a plusliliResearch mindset ability to structure a project from idea to experimentation to prototype to implementationliliuustronguPlease link your KaggleGithub in your applicationustrongliul
